text: TruTV was a Southeast Asian pay television channel owned by Turner Broadcasting System Asia. The channel aired "caught-on-video" reality programs, Adult Swim programs or as TruTV called it, "actuality" television. Previous truTV logo used until 2014. On 31 December 2018, TruTV ceased its broadcast operations at 11:59 PM. However, the selected TruTV programmes will be shown on Warner TV Asia. == See also == *truTV *Turner Broadcasting System == References == Category:Television channels and stations established in 2010 Category:Turner Broadcasting System Asia Pacific Category:Mass media in Southeast Asia Category:Television channels and stations disestablished in 2018
title: TruTV (Southeast Asian TV channel)
